channel.title: Twitter on Joan Perals — UX Developer
channel.description: Recent content in Twitter on Joan Perals — UX Developer

item.title: Colors of Twitter
item.description: Basically by combining Twitter feed data (100 million tweets and counting) with a language detector (together with some geometric post-processing, and lots of hours of coding), I was able to offer a quite detailed look at the language geography of the Twitter universe.
